person.persName: Ralph Stafford (Johnson County, Kentucky, attorney and farmer)

body.p: Johnson County, Kentucky, farmer, attorney, and jailor. Floyd County, Kentucky, native. Son of John Stafford and C. Stafford. Married to Amanda Hager Stafford on February 22, 1849, in Johnson County. Father of Sarah Letitia Stafford, Susan Stafford, Sophronia Stafford, John C. Stafford, and George R. Stafford. Farmer in Johnson County in 1850. Attorney in Johnson County in 1860. County jailor in Johnson County in 1862. Farmer in Johnson County in 1863.
